goal: Find three 'For Sale By Owner' listings in Raleigh, North Carolina. They must have a garage. For each one, pull the owner's contact email if available on the listing. Then, send a single email to myself at 'my.prospects@gomail.com' listing the addresses and the corresponding contact emails you found.

evals.description: Verify that an email was sent to the correct recipient address.

evals.description: Verify that the body of the sent email contains the keyword 'Email:', indicating owner contact emails were included.
